name: 2ralbii
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wb(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w0)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w1)))

stmt.origin: ralbii(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w0), wral(s1, c1, w1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w0)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w1)))
-| wb(wral(s1, c1, w0), wral(s1, c1, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w0)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w1)))
-| wb(wral(s1, c1, w0), wral(s1, c1, w1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wral(s1, c1, w0), wral(s1, c1, w1))
-| wb(w0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w0)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w1)))
-| wb(w0, w1)

comment: Inference adding two restricted universal quantifiers to both sides of an equivalence. (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-2004.)
